creator: n_olding@hotmail.com
text:
I can't join the user mailing list because the mail is rejected, thus:

Hi. This is the qmail-send program at apache.org.
I'm afraid I wasn't able to deliver your message to the following addresses.
This is a permanent error; I've given up. Sorry it didn't work out.

<log4j-user-subscribe@jakarta.apache.org>:
Sorry, no mailbox here by that name. (#5.1.1)

creator: hoju@visi.com
text:
That's the old mailing list.  Log4j is not part of Jakarta anymore.  It is part
of Logging Services  See...
http://logging.apache.org/site/mailing-lists.html

log4j-user-subscribe@logging.apache.org


Jake

Well, the sign-up link on this page is incorrect, then:

http://nagoya.apache.org/wiki/apachewiki.cgi?Log4JProjectPages

Sorry if this is the wrong place to report this...
creator: n_olding@hotmail.com

text: The wiki has been fixed.  Mailing list signup works fine.
creator: yoavs@computer.org
